H0.text: What brand announced, in 2010, that their food used to taste bad. Pizza Hut

H1.text: What brand announced, in 2010, that their food used to taste bad. McDonald's

H3.text: What brand announced, in 2010, that their food used to taste bad. Domino

A4.text: In 2010, Domino's advertising campaign admitted to earlier problems with the public perception of Domino's product owing to taste issues.
